snippet: The program would test new payment technology that would use smartphones or tablets rather than the Taxi TV to collect cab fare.
abstract: New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission board votes in favor of implementing pilot program for replacement to ubiquitous and intrusive Taxi TV screens; taxi commission officials suggest that screens, which have been subject of numerous complaints, may have contributed to abandonment of yellow cabs for Uber and other car services by so many riders.
lead_paragraph: The program would test new payment technology that would use smartphones or tablets rather than the Taxi TV to collect cab fare.

headline.main: Some New York City Cabs to Lose Taxi TV in Pilot Program
headline.print_headline: Taxi Commission Votes to Start Pilot Program to Replace TV Screens
